docs.snippet: BRETTON WOODS, N.H., July 19 -- The United Nations monetary and financial conference reached a deadlock tonight when the Russian delegation, after communicating with Moscow, refused to recede from its demand for a reduction in its subscription to the...
docs.lead_paragraph: BRETTON WOODS, N.H., July 19 -- The United Nations monetary and financial conference reached a deadlock tonight when the Russian delegation, after communicating with Moscow, refused to recede from its demand for a reduction in its subscription to the proposed $10,000,000,000 international bank for reconstruction and development.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, July 20 (AP) -- The Argentine Ambassador for the United States, Adrian Escobar, today "categorically repudiated" a recent published report that he said "presents the Argentine Government as harboring hostile plans toward Chile and...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, July 20 (AP) -- The Argentine Ambassador for the United States, Adrian Escobar, today "categorically repudiated" a recent published report that he said "presents the Argentine Government as harboring hostile plans toward Chile and Uruguay."

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, July 22 -- The Argentine Government decided this morning to abolish censorship on outgoing news, and early this afternoon censors in cable companies were instructed not to interfere with news dispatches sent by any properly accredited...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, July 22 -- The Argentine Government decided this morning to abolish censorship on outgoing news, and early this afternoon censors in cable companies were instructed not to interfere with news dispatches sent by any properly accredited correspondent.
